duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coordinate business continuity planning, using best practices and industry standards, including risk assessments, business impact analyses, and recovery strategies.
Respond to and coordinate the management of incidents and disasters to ensure the continuity of essential business functions.
Develop, maintain, and update business continuity plans and procedures tailored specifically to each business area within the organization.
Ensure overall compliance with business continuity regulatory requirements and best practices.
Design and implement ongoing training, exercise, and awareness programs to promote business continuity and guide stakeholders.
Develop and implement progress metrics to measure and ensure program maturity and effectiveness.
Provide regular reports to senior management regarding the program's status, key risks, and mitigation activities.
Coordinate mass notification testing with internal teams

education_certification.credential: B.S. or B.A. in Business Continuity, Risk Management, IT, or related field required
CBCP, MBCI, MBCP, or CRISC preferred
